daoDesc: DAO is making profit by financing the development of the projects and initiatives based on Waves blockchain.
bannerText: Get PWR to gain a full-scale access to governance and affect on community's decisions. Give a POWER to your voice!
transactionFeeTooltip: A transaction fee is a fee that an account owner pays to send a transaction in the Waves blockchain.
finalisePeriodDesc: Create a transaction for PWR holders to vote with WAVES DAO results.
willBeUnlocked: Your {{assetName}} will be unlocked after the start of new KPI period. The exact amount of {{assetName}} will be known immediately after this time.
MS-0110: There are unlocked tokens on the smart contract. To get them on your balance click the 'Get' button
